original_text: ‘Look!’ they said. ‘We know this man. He usually sits at the Beautiful Gate of the temple and he asks people for money. What has happened to him?’ They were all very surprised.
korean_text: 그가 본래 성전 미문에 앉아 구걸하던 사람인 줄 알고 그에게 일어난 일로 인하여 심히 놀랍게 여기며 놀라니라

sentences.original_text: He usually sits at the Beautiful Gate of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 보통 성전의 아름다운 문에 앉아 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he asks people for money.
